concept.title: Delivery phase
concept.shortdesc: In the delivery phase, build developers package information for translation and produce output for integration with the product or publication on a Web site.

conbody.p: The build should include any additional validation steps your product requires, such as adding copyright information and product information metadata. Build steps can include validating content, verifying accessibility, creating translation packages, adding information such as summary tables or generated views based on metadata, producing PDFs, building navigation and content, and producing plugins, help files, or Web directories. Work with your area's build developers to ensure your hard work gets properly delivered.
